edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.service

Class FileStorageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.service.FileStorageService

  • public class FileStorageService
extends Object
    Encapsulates several operations on files in internal and external storage, including writing data from remote URLs to local files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteFile(Context context, String filename)
      Deletes the specified file from the base directory of the app's internal storage.
      String download(String url, Context context)
      Reads content from an image URL, writing it (if possible) to a file in internal or external storage.
      boolean fileExists(Context context, String filename)
      Checks for the existence of the specified file, relative to the base directory of the app's internal storage.
      String filenameFromUrl(String url)
      Extracts and returns the final component of the path portion of a URL, regardless of scheme.
      static FileStorageService getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of FileStorageService.
      void keepInternalFiles(Context context, Set<String> filenames)
      Deletes all but the specified set of internal files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FileStorageService getInstance()
        Returns the single instance of FileStorageService. Operations on external files use public storage in the Environment.DIRECTORY_PICTURES directory.
        Returns:
        instance.

      • fileExists

        public boolean fileExists(Context context,
                          String filename)
        Checks for the existence of the specified file, relative to the base directory of the app's internal storage.
        Parameters:
        context - runtime app context used for internal storage resolution.
        filename - name of file to check for.
        Returns:
        true if a file by the specified name exists, false otherwise.

      • deleteFile

        public void deleteFile(Context context,
                       String filename)
        Deletes the specified file from the base directory of the app's internal storage.
        Parameters:
        context - runtime app context used for internal storage resolution.
        filename - name of file to delete.

      • keepInternalFiles

        public void keepInternalFiles(Context context,
                              Set<String> filenames)
        Deletes all but the specified set of internal files. Filenames are assumed to be relative to the base directory of the app's internal storage.
        Parameters:
        context - runtime app context used for internal storage resolution.
        filenames - MRU set of filenames to skip when deleting files from local storage cache.

      • filenameFromUrl

        public String filenameFromUrl(String url)
        Extracts and returns the final component of the path portion of a URL, regardless of scheme. Note that if the path portion of url ends with the forward slash character ("/"), an empty string is returned.
        Parameters:
        url - URL from which filename is to be extracted.
        Returns:
        base filename.

      • download

        public String download(String url,
                       Context context)
        Reads content from an image URL, writing it (if possible) to a file in internal or external storage. Non-image media content is ignored. No attempt is made to validate or otherwise process the content. The name of the file created is extracted from the URL, using filenameFromUrl(String).
        Parameters:
        url - content source.
        context - runtime app context used for internal storage; null if external storage should be used.
        Returns:
        resolved (local or remote) URL for media content.
